Detailed Description

Interface to Viola-Jones bases detectors.

Interface required to process using the implementation of the Viola-Jones framework for object detection. The OpenCV implementation was developed by Lienhart.

CDebugLog *  cDebug = NULL 
) [inline]

Class constructor.

Parameters:
ClasifDir Directorio que contiene el detector (NULL se corresponde con el detector facial por defecto
sx Width of patterns to be searched
sy Height of patterns to be searched
boPruning If set reduces the search, recommended for face detection
bofromDirectory If set the classifier is given using a directory
cDebug If not null contains the identifier of the debug file

Member Function Documentation

void CViolaDetector::ProcessImage ( IplImage *  img,
int  scale,
bool  boAppend = false,
CvSize  min_size = cvSize(0,0) 
) [inline]

Process image.

Searches objects using the Viola-Jones general detector framework implemented for OpenCV by Leinhart

Parameters:
img Input image
scale Scale used to reduce inout image dimensions
boAppend If set processes image and appends detections to current list
min_size Minimum window size. By default, it is set to the size of samples the classifier has been trained on.

Paints detection results for head and shoulders detection.

Paints detection results in given image. These results are plotted using two rectangles

Parameters:

color Color to be used
color2 Color to be used
ancho Rectangle border thickness

int  y1prev,
int  x2prev,
int  y2prev,
int  escala 
) [inline]

Selects the most similar detection in terms of size and overlapping.

Returns the index of the new detection highest overlapping with given container

Parameters:
x1prev Previous x cooodinate of the upper left corner
y1prev Previous y cooodinate of the upper left corner
x2prev Previous x cooodinate of the bottom right corner
y2prev Previous y cooodinate of the bottom right corner
escala Indicates the scale used for processing the image. Needed to fit previous and current detections.
